heroTitle: Travel around the world with Belletto Tour
heroSubtitle: Amazing adventures await you. If not now, when?!
aboutText: We are a newly established travel company dedicated to providing an exceptional travel experience tailored to your needs. At BELLETTO TOUR, we believe that every trip should be more than just travel - it should be an adventure filled with discovery, comfort, and unforgettable memories. Whether you're looking for cultural explorations, relaxing vacations, or thrilling adventures, our team is here to make it happen.
title_places: Most traveled destinations around the world
descriptionFirst: A world-famous architectural landmark located in Paris, the capital of France.
descriptionSecond: The world's longest defensive structure, built to protect ancient China from invasions.
descriptionThird: A mausoleum located in Agra, India, known as a symbol of love.
title: One of the most popular travel agencies in 2025
tourists: Tourists have already explored the world with us
experience: Years of experience organizing trips worldwide
rating: Tourists gave our agency excellent reviews
languages: Languages in which tours are conducted
welcome: Welcome to BELLETTO-TOUR! By using our services, you agree to comply with the following terms.
booking_text: All reservations require full or partial prepayment.
cancellation_text: If cancellation is made 48 hours before departure, a partial refund may be possible. If less than 48 hours remain before departure, no refund is given. Tickets purchased via charter flights are non-cancellable and non-refundable. Hotel booking cancellations are not guaranteed refunds. Refunds, if applicable, are processed within 7-30 business days.
liability_text: BELLETTO-TOUR is not responsible for unexpected events such as weather conditions, natural disasters, or issues related to third-party services.
privacy_text: Your personal information is stored securely and is not shared with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
modification_text: BELLETTO-TOUR reserves the right to update these terms at any time. It is your responsibility to check for updates periodically.
contact: If you have any questions, please contact us at support@belletto-travel.uz
formSubtitle: Leave your information and our operator will contact you immediately.
companySlogan: The best journeys together with you!
faq_answer_1: We provide domestic and international tours, hotel bookings, transportation, and visa services.
faq_question_2: How can I book a trip?
faq_answer_2: You can book through our website or by contacting us directly.
faq_answer_3: We accept cash, bank cards, and online payment systems.
address: Address: 30 B, Parkent Street, Tashkent, Uzbekistan
